1.name: Android Studio
1.descr:
Do you know what is common between an artist and an Android developer? Both work at a studio and creates wonders!
Yes, we are talking about Android Studio - the cradle of Android applications. Considering the omnipresence of smart devices running on Android, making Android apps is a useful skill for engineers.
Come over and learn the tricks behind your favorite Android apps and make some on your own!
instructions: Basic Knowledge in Java

2.name: Network Engineering
2.descr:
Want to play between computer networks and make it your career?
In today's ever-growing global age of internet and rise of dominions like the Internet of Things (IoT), it has been indicated once again that automation and the growing presence of Internet will soon encompass everything in our lives.
These services, however, will require 'Network Engineers, engineers who are sound in the field of networks and possess a quality skill set required to deploy this Internet-based Digital future
instructions: Please carry a laptop.

3.name: PLETHORA
3.descr:
Ever wished to see a 3D Printer
Ever wished to operate it
Presenting before you
PLETHORA
CAD LAB,FAB LAB,COMBINED MANUFACTURING AND 3D MODELLING
We welcomes you to the world of design.
Fabricate yourself
Explore it
We don't provide the kit......But will teach you to make it......We teach you to design it in CAD...Then your design is turned into robotic arm parts in FAB lab.Assemble it....Your arm is now ready to move.....!!
instructions: Take Away Kit : Servo Motor(4), Arduino Board(1), Acrylic Sheet(1), Jumper Cables, Wires
Bring your laptops, at least one per team.
Lunch will be provided

4.name: La_Conception
4.descr:
The Training program on All Terrain Vehicle design and analysis and CFD analysis
Sharp your ideas before go ahead
SAEINDIA RIT organizes training program where our experts conduct workshop in an interactive manner with the participants. So that our future engineers comfortably work with new world .Also in light of this workshop we offer specially design course for students to design and fabricate thire car for
BAJA - SAE
SUPRA - SAE
F - SAE
GO kart

SAE PRESENTS an opportunity to race your vehicle..
instructions: Includes food and refreshments

5.name: Fly High
5.descr:
Aerotrix, an industrial partner of Boeing, which was started by IIT Kanpur graduates and who have won the Limca Book of Records for conducting biggest aeromodelling training in the country, is back again in Kerala!
And this time, its a Two-day workshop about Remote Control Aircraft!
Course Highlights

Design, Build & Test your first RC Aircraft from scratch!
Learn all the introductory concepts of aeronautical engineering through aeromodelling
Introduction to Design Algorithm of an aircraft
Hands-on experience on the electronic and electrical instrumentation of an RC aircraft
Topics Covered
Basics of Flight & Aeronautics
Different Systems in an Aircraft
Stability & Control of an Aircraft
Instrumentation in an RC Aircraft
As we have industrial partnership with Boeing, we will help you to get trained for the Boeing IIT National Aeromodelling Challenge! If you are good enough, you could make it up to the competition, which is sponsored by Boeing and is conducted in association with 5 IITs at Bombay, Delhi, Kanpur, Kharagpur and Madras. The partnership is more than 2 years now.
instructions: Accommodation for the participants can be provided in the college campus.

6.name: Gesture Recognition using Open CV
6.descr:
Fed up with typing and clicking?
It's time to say goodbye to your traditional mouse and keyboard.

Yes, you heard that right?

Here is the platform you're searching for.

A one-day workshop, on “Gesture Recognition using OpenCV-Python”. Come and be the master of the idea.

Free yourself from keyboard and mouse!
instructions: Bring your laptops
Registration fee includes food and refreshments

7.name: Machine Learning
7.descr:
Feeling left out of the cutting edge?

Ready to embrace the trending technology which is changing our world?

If so, come make your machine learn better.

Pack your bags. Be a game-changer and make your world smarter. Come, let us imbibe the new buzzword!
instructions: Bring your laptops
Registration fee includes food and refreshments

8.name: Web Development using Django
8.descr:
Hey, are you a web developer?
Or,
Are you someone who aspires to learn web development?
Are you in search to get rid of conventional methods of development and get to know about the recent trends in web development?
Do you want to know the best language and best tools that fits for you?
Then don't waste time...Come and grab your chance at Rajiv gandhi institute of technology kottayam as part of RITU'18 on February 17th, a one day workshop on 'Web Development Using Django' .
Learn and Sharpen your skills.
Focus on your work...
Save your time and build attractive sites effortlessly.
instructions: Bring your laptops
Registration fee includes food and refreshments

9.name: CAD Workshop
9.descr:
A chance to be the perfect professional
Picture yourself walking down the street. How about getting informative graphics in your field of view?
Stunned!!!
Then this is gonna be your future AUGMENTED REALITY
'Creativity comes from unlikely juxtaposition' Then what's engineer's design tool?
CAD
Master the art of Computer Aided Design and talk like an Engineer..
APTITUDE is basically an innate, learned or acquired ability of an individual. Indeed Aptitude is the first step to professionalism.
So let's get nurtured and trained to be the professionals..

10.name: ENIAC
10.descr:
Techie friends, prepare yourselves to enter the Innovation Zone!
Embrace your ideas, unleash your creativity and let your intelligence have fun!
The Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering of Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Kottayam, in association with RITU 2018, presents before you ENIAC, a collaboration of two parallel workshops on 'Electrical Machine Design' and 'Speed Recognition of Electric Motor using sound' and a technical talk hosted by KSEB. Also, to unleash your skills and put your intelligence to the test, a technical competition will be conducted at the end, based on the workshops.
Grab this golden opportunity and make your ideas happen in ENIAC- The Electrical Symposium
Prizes worth 10K (5k+5k) !
instructions: Students can participate in any one of the two workshops.
There can be a maximum of 5 members in a group.
Participants may register individually also. However, they will be allotted a group at the time of the workshop.
The technical competition will be held separately for each workshop. Participation will be groupwise.
Lunch and  refreshments will be provided.
Only limited seats are available
Last date for registration is 27 February 2018
